definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: brier (√ unknown):— [[סִלּוֹן מַמְאִיר]] Ez Eze 28:24 a pricking brier (fig. of national distress; ‖[[קוֹץ מַכְאִב]]); pl. [[סַלּוֹנִים]] Eze 2:6 ( + [[סָרָבִים]]; Co [after Vrss] Berthol [not Toy] rd. ([[אותך]]) [[סׂרְבִים וְסׂלִים]] resisting and despising thee; ´[[סִל]] is then Pt. from I. [[סלה]]).
